system.effect: Allows wearer to survive without food for up to 2 weeks before having to make a -10 Toughness Test. Failing suffers one fatigue which cannot be eliminated until other nourishment is consumed.

description.value: Allows wearer to survive without food for up to 2 weeks before having to make a -10 Toughness Test. Failing suffers one fatigue which cannot be eliminated until other nourishment is consumed.
